text_block_list.text: (clank clank)

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: Excuse me. Is trainer <username> in?

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
Oh, thank God. I really wanted to
give this to you in person.

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: It was finally released today.

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: — "Monthly Twinkle Special Issue".

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
There were a lot of requests from
readers lately. For a special edition
regarding the past three years.

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
I'm sure readers agree that these
years have been a momentous period
in the world of Uma Musume.

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: … A whole lot happened after all.

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
As a reporter, I feel very fortunate
to have been able to follow these three
years.

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: And that I could meet you.

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: By the way—

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: Did you get a good look at the cover?

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: Yeah.

At her urging, I looked at
the cover. There was—

A large photo of <chrname>
staring back at me.

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
When I was thinking about who should be
the cover— the face of the magazine…

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
There was only one candidate
that came to my mind.

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
And that was the opinion of the
editorial team as well.

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
We, at Twinkle Monthly, will continue to
support you and your work.

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: We will follow you, trainer <username>.

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
Through all my interviews I've become
convinced that you are the ray of
sunshine illuminating the horse girl
world.
choice_data_list: Thanks! I'll make her shine too!
Thanks! I'll make her shine too!

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: … Su, su… susu, …sususuh!!!!

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: Splendid!

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
Make your horse girl shine! In other
words, be prepared to become a shadow
yourself!

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
You will continue to devote your whole
life to her, spend everything you have,
take her to races and trips anywhere in
the world!

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
Ah…, you're the one I've been looking
for…!
… Otonashi's usual outbursts have begun.

I can feel her thoughts from the
magazine. I'll show <chrname> later…!

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
This special issue includes
a little special feature.

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: Hehe, look further down the pages.

At her prompt I opened the second
half of the magazine.
There's—

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
"A word to <chrname> and
her trainer <username>"

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
In fact, the editorial department
has received many fan letters
from readers to you.

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
The response was so great that
we compiled pages with support
messages to the two of you.

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
This is pretty much the first time we
attempted such a reader-driven, multi-
page feature, you know?

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, please deliver that gratitude
to your fans at races and live
performances.

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
We, the editors, are here to help you
connect with your fans.

I can feel Otonashi's sentiments. I'll
show this article to <chrname> later…!

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
Could you take a look at the pages
just a little further ahead?

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: Yeah.

At Otonashi's urging, I turned
a few pages. There was—

There was a special feature called
"In the footsteps of glory with
<chrname> and trainer".

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
You have been an integral part of the
Umamusume world for the past three
years.

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
I couldn't just fit it into a small
article, so I talked it over with my
editor.

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
— I told him everyone would look forward
to a feature with these people.

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, of course I am one of them.
I'm looking forward to your future
activities, okay?

I can feel Otonashi's excitement. I'll
show <chrname> this article later…!

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: Did you see the right side of that page?

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: Yeah.

There's a small feature there called
"Promising Trainers and Uma Musume".

It described a training session
with <chrname> and commented on
the high expectations.

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
"I can't wait to see what they do in the
future." … There are no lies there.

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, I'll be covering you two's
trajectory.

Otonashi's feelings reached me. I'll
show this article to <chrname> later…!
